welcomeSection.title: GraphiQL-clone
welcomeSection.welcomeDescr: GraphiQL is the GraphQL integrated development environment (IDE). It’s a powerful (and all-around awesome) tool you’ll use often while building Gatsby websites. It offers syntax highlighting, intellisense autocompletion, automatic documentation, and much more.

mainSection.editorPlaceholder: Please enter GraphQL query or paste the placeholder
mainSection.variablesPlaceholder: Please enter variables or paste the placeholder

auth.emailPatternErrorMessage: E-mail must contain minimum 3 symbols that can be letters, digits or special characters (-_$!%*#?&) before @
auth.passwordPatternErrorMessage: Password must contain minimum 8 symbols, at least one letter, one digit, one special character (-_$!%*#?&)

notFound.descrText: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.
